casebody.data:
GENERAL MOTORS CORPORATION (AS TRANSFEREE IN COMPLETE LIQUIDATION OF WALTER J. BEMB, INC.) v. THE UNITED STATES UNITED MOTORS SERVICE, INCORPORATED, v. THE UNITED STATES [Nos. 43947, 43929]

[Ante, p. 169; 312 U. S. —]

Capital stock tax and excess profits tax; constitutionality; declaration of value not arbitrary; authority of Congress.

Decided November 12, 1940. Demurrer sustained and petition dismissed.

Petition for writ of certiorari denied by the Supreme Court March 31, 1941.
